title: Account hacked/Can't log in still (Since Saturday)/Ticket at 48 hours+
body:
I had to ask a friend to borrow this account just to post on the forums. (I tried to make one, but I had to be "level 1 or higher" to even make a post...)

The account name is McGruff

I was playing Saturday around 12-2 PM and then got off and tried to log back in at around 5ish to find out that I can't log in. It says password or username is incorrect which was impossible. Then I tried to change the email which lead me no where. I don't know if they changed the email or not. The email that I originally made the account I had to delete, because that email got hacked into and was subscribed to various spam newsletters, etc. I think I switched the email to the one I have now, but I had to switch so many accounts to the new email that I don't remember if I missed this one. In the support ticket I showed various methods of verification. I also made a riot points purchase and even included the card that I used for the purchase. Overall, I just wanted to play this weekend on my account, but couldn't. I also am worried about the use of the riot points, if I can get my account back, etc. I had it since 2012 and have invested a significant amount of money into the account. I appreciate your time into resolving this issue.

The ticket was made under xMcGruff I do believe
(the account I had to make to even look at the ticket)

replies.body:
Sometimes I need to give those little support poros a little nudge....-_-'

I've got your ticket pulled up now, and it looks like an agent is in the process of responding as we speak. Make sure to be on the lookout for their response shortly ^_^!
